nodes.text: Oon Garat was a gray-skinned female alien who served as a lieutenant of the Hutt crime lord Zodoh during the Aquilaris campaign of the Republic Dark Age. She served aboard his fighter carrier flagship Voracious and met her demise during the Battle of Darkknell in 1032 BBY when she was exposed and swept into zero gravity space.

Oon Garat was present during a hologram conference with several Sith Lords including Odion, Arkadia Calimondra and Malakite aboard Zodoh's flagship Voracious. During the meeting, her Hutt master outlined his plans of selling slaves and munitions to the Sith Lords in exchange for their cooperation. She was also aware of his plans to use Stormdrivers to create artificial floods on Aquilaris in 1032 BBY.

Following the meeting, she expressed her doubts that the Sith could not be trusted. Zodoh replied that the Sith could be trusted to covet and were not aware of his true intentions. Garat reported that the Stormdriver had collected the needed data on Aquilaris prior to its destruction by Jenn Devaad's Devil Squadron starfighters during the Battle of Capital Cay. Satisfied that his old Republic enemy Devaad had arrived too late to stop his plans, he ordered Oon Garat to send a courier to Nal Hutta with orders to deploy the Stormdrivers. Zodoh realized that the Sith would not tolerate a Hutt competitor but boasted he would defeat them and claim control of the Grumani sector.

Oon Garat was also present during the Battle of Darkknell where she handed Zodoh a Mandalorian vibroblade during a duel with Kerra. She was subsequently killed when Jenn's starfighter shot open the warship's control dome, exposing the crew to zero gravity space.

Oon Garat was first introduced as a minor supporting antagonist in the Deluge story arc of the Star Wars: Knight Errant comic series which debuted on August 2011. John Jackson Miller developed her story background while he was drawn by Ivan Rodriguez and colored by Michael Atiyeh.
